CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.5.2, reportercomment (500 AN)
E2B (R3): H.2 Reporter's Comments User Guidance: This data element captures the reporter's comments on the diagnosis, causality assessment or other issues considered relevant. Conformance Optional Data Type: 20000AN OID: None Value Allowed: Free text
CustomField.inlineHelpText: User Guidance: This data element captures the reporter's comments on the diagnosis, causality assessment or other issues considered relevant.
CustomField.label: Reporter's Comments
